backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and their roles in styling, config, layout, and PWA behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with metadata and root mount point, free of PWA tags.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Composes the main page structure with header, content sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/landing/AboutSec: About section with mission/values cards and a CTA scrolling to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactS: Contact section containing info cards and a demo contact form with smooth-scroll helpers.
frontend/src/components/landing/Features: Displays a grid of six feature cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero banner with messaging, CTAs for navigation, and highlight metrics.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer component with brand section, quick links, resources, and smooth-scroll handlers.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with desktop and mobile navigation, smooth scrolling, and a toggleable mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Simple layout wrapper that centers content within a max-width container.
frontend/src/components/pwa/OfflineNotic: Empty placeholder component for offline/PWA notices.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication context and provider managing login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Example React Query hook demonstrating how to query with an authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and typography rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Stub that disables service worker registration for non-PWA delivery.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, container settings, animations, and theme tokens.
project_state.json: Defines current project scope prioritizing a fully clickable website mock while deferring PWA features, and lists existing features and requests related to site frontend, theme, and PWA changes.
